author: zsfelfoldi
content:
Let me just share my latest updates here again as they might be relevant for next ACDE: I updated EIP-7745 with specs for the log index proof format and the required wire protocol extension for log index state initialization.
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-7745.md
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/assets/eip-7745/log_index_proof_format.md
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/assets/eip-7745/wire_protocol_extension.md

author: poojaranjan
content: In case any PR to move these proposals to `Final` is still waiting,  please add them to [EIP Editing Office Hour](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1839) starting in ~20 mins.

author: wolovim
content:
first iteration of a fork scheduling tool up here: https://forkcast.org/schedule

goal is to help make more informed and realistic timeline decisions. it tries to work backwards from a mainnet target date and fill in the rest. any dates can be "locked" and the duration between events can be tuned in the Settings tab. anything you change persists in localstorage until you hit the Reset button. 

fine print: nothing in here represents a commitment; its just another exploratory communication aid. feedback desired - DMs open!

author: abcoathup
content: first iteration of a fork scheduling
